issue.title: [Rust] Rust datafusion implementation should not depend on rustyline
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5785](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5785). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The rust implementation of datafusion produces both a library and a cli. The cli is not necessarily useful for downstream consumers so its dependencies should not show up in the library.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5785?focusedCommentId=16875359) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4742
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4742>
